data.name: My boss is weird - Sponsorship team
data.detailed_description:
This DLC adds the function of character drawing, which can select three characters in the game and place them in the favorite scene，Click the space bar to remove the UI and take a manual screenshot.

Roles include: May, Supervisor, Kate

There are nine scenes, which are company downstairs, company, bedroom, street, coffee shop and so on

The content of this DLC is relatively small. The purchase of this DLC is in support of the R&D team, and the team will give away a new Gentleman Mode as a token of appreciation
data.about_the_game:
This DLC adds the function of character drawing, which can select three characters in the game and place them in the favorite scene，Click the space bar to remove the UI and take a manual screenshot.

data.short_description: This content needs to have a basic game on steam to play.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
